nodes.name: adjustInflationRate

nodes.documentation: @dev adjusts the mint rate when the yearly inflation update is called
nodes.name: adjustMintRates

nodes.documentation: @dev anyone can call this function to update the inflation rate yearly
nodes.name: updateInflationRate

nodes.documentation:
//////////
 @dev staking function which allows users to stake an amount of tokens to gain interest for up to 1 year
nodes.name: stake

nodes.documentation: @dev staking function which allows users to stake an amount of tokens for another user
nodes.name: stakeFor

nodes.documentation:
@dev Transfer tokens from the contract to the user when unstaking
 @param _value uint256 the amount of tokens to be transferred
nodes.name: transferFromContract

nodes.documentation:
@dev stake function reduces the user's total available balance and adds it to their staking balance
 @param _value how many tokens a user wants to stake
nodes.name: stakeScale

nodes.documentation: @dev deposit a user's initial stake plus earnings if the user unstaked at least 14 days ago
nodes.name: claimStake

nodes.documentation:
@dev allows users to start the reclaim process for staked tokens and stake rewards
 @return bool on success
nodes.name: initUnstake
timeUntilClaimAvaliable
stakeBalanceOf
getStakingGains
calculateStakeGains

nodes.documentation: @dev set the new totalStakingHistory mapping to the current timestamp and totalScaleStaked
nodes.name: setTotalStakingHistory

nodes.documentation:
//////////
 @dev allows contract owner to claim their allocated mint
nodes.name: ownerClaim

nodes.documentation:
@dev sets the address for the rewards pool
 @param _newAddress pool Address
nodes.name: setPool
calculateFraction
calculateMintTotal
